job description


about satsure

satsure is a deep tech decision intelligence company that works primarily at the nexus of agriculture infrastructure and climate action creating an impact for the other millions focusing on the developing world we want to make insights from earth observation data accessible to all

we are looking for a talented data analyst to join our team the ideal candidate should have experience in business intelligence tools like tableau and a strong passion for working with data to drive business decisions as a data analyst you will be responsible for analyzing large sets of data creating reports providing actionable insights and ensuring data quality

if you are interested in working in an environment that focuses on the impact on society driven by cuttingedge technology and where you will have the freedom to work on innovative ideas and be creative with no hierarchies satsure is the place for you

roles and responsibilities

data analysis analyze large and complex data sets to identify trends patterns and insights utilize statistical techniques and data mining methods to extract meaningful information from structured and unstructured data

dashboard development develop interactive and visually appealing dashboards using tableau to effectively represent data and facilitate datadriven decisionmaking across the organization ensure dashboards are userfriendly accessible and meet business requirements

report generation design and create comprehensive reports that summarize data analysis findings key metrics and actionable recommendations present datadriven insights to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner

data visualization utilize tableaus advanced features to create visually compelling charts graphs and maps that effectively communicate complex data to diverse audiences apply best practices in data visualization to ensure clarity and accuracy

data quality assurance ensure the accuracy completeness and integrity of data used in analysis and reporting conduct data validation and reconciliation processes to identify and resolve data inconsistencies or errors

stakeholder collaboration collaborate with crossfunctional teams including business stakeholders data engineers and data scientists to understand business requirements data needs and project objectives translate business questions into data analysis tasks and deliver actionable insights

experience

 years of working experience as data analyst with a strong focus on tableau and power bi

strong analytical and problemsolving skills with a keen attention to detail

proficient in sql and excel with the ability to write complex queries

ability to work independently and in a team environment

education qualification

the ideal candidate would be from a mathematics statistics computer science or a related discipline with

a role with 
data analytics da
 means being a part of the team that works closely with the business and identifies problems  opportunities for improved decisionmaking through better data analysis this covers the whole gamut from simple descriptive analysis to more complex predictive and prescriptive analytics using advanced modeling and machine learning techniques primarily using open source technologies and big data platforms the emphasis is on actionable insights which is possible through a combination of technical skills and business understanding

as data analyst in data analytics you will work closely with businessproduct teams and understand their prioritiesroadmap based on this understanding you are expected to identify appropriate metrics that will drive the right decisions for the business and then build reporting solutions to deliver these metrics at the required frequency in an optimal and reliable fashion you will also answer adhoc questions from your business users by conducting quick analysis on relevant data identify trends and correlations and form hypotheses to explain the observations some of these will lead to bigger analytical projects of increasing complexity where you will work initially as a part of a bigger team but also work independently as you gain more experience finally you are expected to always adhere to project schedule and technical rigor as well as requirements for documentation code versioning etc

a market research analyst is a professional who collects data from multiple sources and uses it to forecast trends to try and predict where the market will go in the future they use current trends then compare them with future expectations to make strategic decisions about where resources should go next
job responsibilities
collecting data on consumers competitors and market place and consolidating information into actionable items reports and presentations
understanding business objectives and designing surveys to discover prospective customers preferences
compiling and analyzing statistical data using modern and traditional methods to collect it  perform valid and reliable market research swot analysis
interpret data formulate reports and make recommendations
use online market research and catalogue findings to databases
provide competitive analysis on various companies market offerings identify market trends pricingbusiness models sales and methods of operation
evaluate program methodology and key data to ensure that data on the releases are accurate and the angle of the release is correct
remain fully informed on market trends other parties researches and implement best practices

collect and process large datasets from a variety of resources

create data visualizations and dashboards to communicate findings

customer focused with the highest standards for delivering value  exceeding customer expectations flexibility to include willingness and ability to readily respond to changing circumstances and expectations

demonstrated ability to manage multiple complex often competing priorities

a track record of autonomy leadership and selfdirection identify a problem propose a solution and make it happen execute biased toward action and reflection

demonstrated ability to manage functional work without managing participants directly

excellent analytical presentation and writing skills as well as the ability to communicate and collaborate effectively in english

about the role


data analyst  responsible banking tribe


role location  rmz ecoworld bangalore


role type  fte 


at anz our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive and to achieve this we are looking for data analysts who deeply understand the power of data to generate quality customer insight manage information and identify trends to accelerate sound business decisions within the customer resolution and remediation tribe you will apply your strong data and technical skills to source and interrogate data to ultimately remediate our customers when we have got it wrong


what will your day look like


source and validate data from a variety of sources big data platform hadoop oracle teradata enterprise data assets core mainframe systems to combine synthesise and analyse to generate insights


define and conduct tests to validate that data is fit for purpose and that remediation calculations are correct and accurate


leverage your knowledge on business process anz product and associated data to write complex queriesscripts in pythonspark sql language to identify the impacted accounts and calculate the refund owed to customers when we have got it wrong


analyse data and maintain data integrity as data passes through crrs bespoke built applications


perform data analysis in order to support individual missions of squads


support key data platform andor data scheduling jobs to support insights delivery to key audiences eg frontline other tribes


contribute to the prevention of reremediation by documenting and communicating insights into what causes customer remediations


peer review other das code and ensure solutions built to defined requirements


mature the data chapter in responsible banking by educating and coaching peers on data analyst techniques and principles


enhance tools and processes within the data chapter


contribute to strategic tribewide tools and knowledge management


what will you bring


a healthy balance of anz product primarily loans andor cards but not limited to these and business process knowledge combined with solid technical datamining abilities


poweruser level capability to consume and analyse data in hadoopbig data technologies oracle and teradata


handson knowledge and experience with tools and techniques for analysis data manipulation and presentation eg plsql python pyspark impala and other scripting tools


able to define plan and execute testing and cleansing of data


proven ability to work with large data sets s of tb


ability to effectively communicate and present to all stakeholders translate technical into nontechnical and viceversa


analytical and inquisitive mindset to continuously improve the level of insight surfaced


strong ability to perform statistical and forensic analysis


strong ability to translate data insights into practical business recommendations


strong coaching  mentoring skills


moderate data visualisation skills


so why join us


theres something special about being part of anz from the moment you join us youre part of a team working towards a common goal improving the financial wellbeing and sustainability of our millions of customers and thats big


but its not just our customers who will feel your impact youll feel it too because at anz youll have the resources and community you need to take the next big step in your career towards even bigger things in the future


we offer a range of benefits tailored to the countries in which we operate to provide all our people


health and wellbeing programs


discounts on selected products and services from anz and beyond


flexible working arrangements lifestyle leave and career breaks


youll also enjoy working in a diverse and inclusive workplace where the different backgrounds perspectives and life experiences of our people are celebrated we encourage you to talk to us about any adjustments you may require to our recruitment process or the role itself if you are a candidate with a disability let us know how we can provide you with additional support

Job Description:
the team is responsible for owning developing and maintaining the asset and wealth management  core logical data model and the business glossary in support of developing data products for maintaining and accessing core enterprise level data




asset and wealth management  chief data office cdo manages the lineofbusiness data strategy and vision to have a scalable agile wellengineered data platform that powers nearrealtime insights to deliver differentiated experiences for our broad and diversified client base the data product metadata management team members work closely with senior management to help execute the firmwide data productbased approach to accelerate data value realization with descriptive and predictive analytics the centralized team has members in new york city columbus london mumbai and bangalore





job responsibilities


logical data modelling understanding analyzing capturing and maintaining business data requirements using data models ensuring these models are consistent and that the business glossary is linked and maintained in a manner that allows impact assessment and lineage of metadata

maintaining business data requirements in specific normalized and extensible logical data models

data model review and adoption review adopt and integrate data models from firmwide other line of business and development teams into awm line of business models provide review feedback to firmwide and application teams

documentation a central data portal that details all the awm data modelling standards keeping this information up to date and relevant is key

managing the linkage between the logical data model business glossary and any physical artifacts to ensure traceability and consistency of terms and definitions

loading and versioning of the models into a central metadata repository and maintain data integrity rules assisting data analysts with capturing business rules and translating into clear requirement specifications and then into the data model expressed in a structured language is a task the data modeler is responsible for

bachelors degree or equivalent preferably with a major in one of the following subjects finance commerce computer science information technology

proficient with a data modelling tool such as erwin powerdesigner or magicdraw er entity relationship modelling to a competent level to be able to coach others in business requirements capture

a good understanding of financial and business data such as instrument data instrument pricing data party  account data positions  transactions fund data investment performance data index  benchmark data market vendor data for buyside researchers and portfolio managers

effective with minimal supervision works under own initiative and executes with endtoend focus influences and manages key aspects of the business  function

excellent communication skills with the ability to be comfortable in a confrontational situation team player with relationship building skills



preferred qualifications capabilities and skills



a good understanding of different modelling notations uml orm etc

metadata management metadata repository data dictionary usage and associated tools

an understanding of what constitutes best practice data governance and data quality controls including data mining data transfer and data profiling technologies

business analysis experience within banking and financial services industry preferably in the asset and wealth management space

working knowledge of business intelligence and analytics tools such as alteryx tableau qlik etc

 years of experience in business operations data analytics operations analytics consulting investment banking and or corporate strategy as an analyst

join us as a risk  controls assurance analyst

this is an opportunity for a passionate and driven analyst to join us in our risk function

youll support with the design and development of assurance activity on an endtoend basis identifying and addressing risks and working collaboratively with the function to close identified gaps

hone your existing analytical skills and advance your career in this exciting fast paced role

were offering this role at associate level

what youll do

youll be playing a key part in supporting an effective and efficient assurance function meeting all policy standard owner legal and regulatory requirements and expectations youll also look to improve assurance processes procedures and scheduling methodologies to make sure that the global methodology and supporting processes are consistent up to date and fully aligned with the banks policy framework and any respective legal or regulatory requirements

other key requirements include

contributing to the development and delivery of an annual riskbased assurance programme to confirm that key policies and controls have been effectively implemented

working to improve and support the assurance toolset to support a robust process that develops the right outcomes for the organisation

developing and supporting integrated system solutions that drive efficiency savings including the potential to utilise external assurance solutions to reduce cost

articulating control weaknesses risks and potential remediation in a formal written report suitable for senior stakeholders

helping to maintain the annual assurance schedule monitoring delivery and our overall governance and risk position

the skills youll need

to thrive in this role youll ideally have experience of working in and knowledge of a risk and controls environment along with an understanding of the operational risk handbook

in addition youll need at least three years of experience in testing it general controls ideally gained in a regulated financial services firm internal or external audit or first line controls function ideally youll also bring experience of working with robotic process automation solutions

youll also need

a background in assurance and risk management methodologies

a good understanding of the application of operational risk in a financial services environment

experience of operating in an audit assurance or risk function

experience of developing relationships with stakeholders and building positive working relationships

job description summary what you need to know about the role application of data science and analytics to enhance the seller risk management of large enterprises who use paypal and braintree to process digital payments meet our team the team is responsible for managing seller risk for the large enterprise portfolio generating b in annual processing and m in seller losses the role of the team is to drive sustainable growth of this portfolio while managing the losses in line with risk appetite it is a strategyoriented role focused on execution which involves working with a many crossfunctional teams  product data sales operations business etc data driven decision are critical to this execution and hence a strong data science analytics and stats foundation is key


job description

your way to impact

help improve risk decisions using internal and external data intelligence work is extremely foundational as this space is undergoing a transformation there is a lot of opportunity to make a lasting impact

your day to day

part of the transformation team so defining a new risk management framework  fundamental change to how we assess credit risk for paypal large enterprises and its impact to riskadjustedrevenue and ram we are making the framework more objective driven rather than being driven by underwriter discretion

improve risk data intelligence  both internal payments data components and external data through vendors

day to day also involves descriptive prescriptive analytics building dashboards for monitoring  reporting

what do you need to bring

job needs analytics number sense data storytelling ability to think of the big picture strategic thinking along with hands on analytics skillset to drive decision making process

crossfunctional role  orchestration of the entire risk strategy and working with model builders product managers engineers operations team data infra teams to execute on the strategy we are the accountable party

communication is important

basic qualifications

bachelors degree or higher in a quantitative field business math economics finance statistics science engineering

minimum of  years of experience in the risk domain associated with payments fintech banking or the ecommerce industry

experience with technical tools such as sql python tableau

the business analyst is responsible for analyzing business processes identifying areas for improvement and proposing solutions to enhance overall efficiency and effectiveness this role requires close collaboration with stakeholders gathering requirements and analyzing business operations to provide insights and recommendations the business analyst plays a key role in bridging the gap between business needs and technology solutions often involved in project management system implementation and change management
key result areas
 conduct thorough analysis of existing business processes workflows and systems
 gather and document detailed requirements from stakeholders for new projects or system enhancements
 analyze data metrics and performance indicators to identify areas of improvement and inefficiencies
 propose and recommend solutions to address identified issues and improve business outcomes
 collaborate with stakeholders to ensure alignment between proposed solutions and business needs
 assist in project management activities including overseeing project timelines deliverables and resource allocation
 support system implementation and change management efforts ensuring smooth transition and user adoption
 provide ongoing support and guidance to business users addressing questions and concerns related to implemented solutions
 stay updated on industry trends and best practices in business analysis and process improvement
required competencies
 strong analytical and problemsolving skills to analyze complex business processes and identify improvement opportunities
 excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at various levels
 proficient in gathering and documenting requirements using appropriate techniques and tools
 ability to perform data analysis and use relevant tools to derive insights and make datadriven recommendations
 knowledge of project management methodologies and experience in managing project deliverables and timelines
 familiarity with system implementation and change management processes
 strong attention to detail and organizational skills to manage multiple priorities and tasks effectively
 ability to work independently as well as part of a team demonstrating selfmotivation and initiative

council on energy environment and water ceew new delhi

research analyst  solar agriculture



at ceew we are deliberate about what we stand for and what we dont stand for as an employer so if the below description strikes a chord we would love to hear from you



at ceew we build careers in public policy




we offer strong visionary leadership  with emphasis on research and impact at scale


we actively promote leadership by initiative


we celebrate talent and ambition


you will be surrounded by smart people who will challenge you and help you grow


you will learn faster than your peers in other organisations


curiosity and irreverence as well as responsibility come together at ceew


you will get abovemarket remuneration


we provide a safe space for all


at ceew your life is your example for others




designation offered

research analyst



focus area

energy transitions



number of job openings

 one is based in delhi and the other is based in jaipur



location

delhijaipur



reporting to

programme associate



purpose



ceew is looking for qualified individuals passionate about bringing solar revolution to agricultural consumers by facilitating adoption under the ongoing pm kusum scheme this role will require the candidates to actively engage with central ministries and concerned state departments to provide necessary implementation and research support to develop fitforpurpose solutions towards accelerating the pm kusum rollout by overcoming market barriers having prior knowledge of various policies programmes and regulations associated with the pm kusum scheme and the indian agricultural system would be an added advantage ceews energy transitions team serves as a knowledge partner to various state nodal agencies and assists in implementing schemes outlined in their renewable energy policies the aim of the project is to identify barriers and suggest institutional financial technological regulatory and behavioural solutions to enhance the adoption of solar agriculture in india the candidate should have prior experience in conducting both qualitative and quantitative research and must be able to collaborate effectively with industry government and civil society stakeholders at the state and substate levels



ceew provides an intellectually stimulating and supportive work environment that emphasises research rigour innovative thinking and strategic outreach we are seeking a meticulous and motivated individual who is passionate about translating research into action in addition to solar agriculture research the candidate will be responsible for providing data collection and analytical assistance to the broader team focused on increasing the share of renewables in the grid we recommend that applicants visit the energy transitions team page on the ceew website for more details about our projects



job duties and accountabilities



primary responsibilities




regularly track important research findings policy and regulatory developments in the sector and conduct rigorous literature review


conducting research the research analyst will be responsible for conducting thorough research into solar agriculture this will involve reviewing existing literature conducting field studies and gathering data to gain a deeper understanding of the field


analysing data the research analyst will be responsible for analysing data related to solar agriculture this will involve using statistical and technical softwares like python sam excel etc and other tools to identify trends patterns and correlations in the data it will also involve travel to project sites to collect data or conduct interviews for research


actioning the research finding the research analysts must communicate their findings to various audiences including researchers policymakers and the public this will involve writing articles for academic journals presenting at conferences or creating educational materials for the public with the help of ceews outreach team


collaborating with others the research analyst will need to work closely with other researchers farmers solar developers state officials and other stakeholders in the renewables and agriculture industry collaboration will be essential to ensure that the research is relevant and valuable to those who will be implementing solar agriculture practices


identifying new research opportunities the research analyst will be responsible for identifying new research opportunities in the field of solar agriculture this will involve keeping uptodate with the latest developments in solar technology and agriculture and identifying areas where further research is needed to advance the field




selection criteria



education and experience




masters degree in public policy energy engineering electrical engineering mechanical engineering energy economics or related field


at least  years of relevant work experience however candidates with extremely strong quantitative skills with lesser experience may also be considered


the candidate must possess a robust research background demonstrated by peerreviewed publications


the candidate should possess indepth knowledge of the electricity distribution and solar sector




key skills




strong ability to organise process and analyse large data sets that are used and derived through powerenergy models


excellent written and oral communication skills


ability to summarise and communicate the insightsfindings as reports and presentations


strong technical expertise and interpersonal skills


proficiency in ms excel and understanding of programming languages like python r and other software for performing quantitative analysissimulations


proficiency in hindi and english is a must proficiency in multiple languages is preferred


experience in engaging with different stakeholders including central and state government officials discom officials and researchers




personality




willingness to work on multidisciplinary projects


willingness to learn new research and project management skills


ability to identify creative solutions to vexing challenges in taking policy to action


ability to adapt and deliver under tight deadlines in a professional environment


ability to effectively work in a team while being able to independently drive the work with minimum assistance


ability and willingness to dig deeper into details while also keeping a sense of the broader objectives and big picture


willingness to learn grow and develop at a personal and professional front at a rapid pace with a steep learning curve


ability to work in an interdisciplinary and multicultural environment




ceew operates in a dynamic environment and the candidate will be required to show flexibility in undertaking a variety of tasks



compensation



competitive compensation  commensurate to the qualificationexperience and matching the best of standards adopted by industry or other similar organisations for the proposed role



application process



ceew is an equal opportunity employer and the selection process does not discriminate on the basis of age gender caste ethnicity religion or sexuality female candidates are encouraged to apply



applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis interested applicants are advised to apply at the earliest possible



only shortlisted candidates will be contacted we appreciate your interest

job summary



the international food policy research institute ifpri seeks to hire a highly motivated energetic and dataoriented research analyst for a fulltime oneyear renewable appointment in the nutrition diet and health unit ndh the selected candidate will work closely with senior researchers in the unit and with nutrition policy and research partners the position will include engagement in quantitative research to support policy efforts on nutrition and health in india and assisting with the development and implementation of a nutrition coverage survey in india and ethiopia job duties will include conducting quantitative data analysis conducting literature reviews including policy and program reviews and assisting in the preparation of reports and journal manuscripts the position will provide exciting opportunities to gain firsthand field experience and participate in conducting high quality and rigorous evaluations



the position will be based in new delhi india and is renewable based on performance and funding 
interested applicants must have work authorization to work in india
 and must be willing to actively support work in partnership with policy counterparts



the final grade level will be determined by level of education and years of relevant work experience



essential duties




duties include but are not limited to


conducting quantitative data analysis of large household survey data sets on nutrition and health


organizing cleaning and analyzing primary survey data


assisting with the design and development of survey instruments and protocols


travelling to survey locations to support enumerator training field team monitoring and meetings with project partners and collaborators


contributing to literature reviews project reports research papers and other deliverables including preparing tables and graphs and drafting reportpaper sections


supporting activities related to communications and knowledge products stakeholder consultations writing blogs preparation of research and policy briefs


providing research and analytical support for workshops and conferences


coordinating with and managing national and international partners and collaborators involved in the projects


other tasks as assigned




required qualifications




research analyst i bachelors degree plus two years of relevant professional experience or masters degree in economics agricultural and applied economics public policy nutrition or a closely related field


research analyst ii masters degree in one of the above fields plus minimum three years of postmasters relevant experience


experience using statistical software packages especially stata


demonstrated experience working with large survey data sets such as dhs nfhs or nsso andor administrative data from programs


excellent spoken and written english


ability to multitask work efficiently and independently and consistently meet deadlines


strong interpersonal skills and crosscultural sensitivity


demonstrated professional level of attention to detail and accuracy of work


willingness and ability to travel internationally including to rural areas to conduct fieldwork and supervise primary data collection




preferred qualifications




prior work experience with researchers and research organizations in india andor ethiopia


familiarity with health nutrition social protection or livelihoods programs


experience in survey design questionnaire design and conducting and supervising household surveys in developing countries


fluency in written and spoken hindi or other south asian languages including bangla

employee will sit in an upright position for a long period of time


employee will lift between  pounds


employee is required to have close visual acuity to perform activities such as preparing and analyzing data and figures transcribing viewing computer terminal extensive reading

purpose



ceew seeks to hire a research analyst for its power sector team our power sector programme is driven with the mission to support the clean energy transition in india by examining and promoting operational financial and environmental sustainability throughout the value chain of the electricity sector through evidence based objective research and cuttingedge analytical approaches we are looking for an experienced professional with handson experience and deep sectoral understanding to build and expand the work on energy efficiency in thermal power generation as well as industrial sectors



pertaining to coalbased generation the research focus would be on opportunities to improve efficiency of the generation fleet through an assessment of various state level dependency on coal based generation and contracts and tracking the environmental performance of coalbased fleet additionally the role would also assess the dependence on captive generation by industrial units and the economic and technical implications of switching to procurement through different green power options the candidate should have an idea of the electricity market and its economics an ideal candidate should be able to liaise with key actors to develop and communicate solutions to emerging issues



the successful applicant will assist fellow researchers in undertaking robust quantitative and qualitative analysis in addition to the duties and responsibilities outlined below the candidate should be prepared as and when necessary to take on additional responsibilities and respond to events and developments that cannot be anticipated easily



job duties and accountabilities




to understand the challenges and drivers for renewable energy uptake by the corporates


to evaluate the new markets instruments to support renewable energy integration


assist in the evaluation of the efficiency of captive power plants of the industries and identifying the efficiency gaps


assist with specific projects and overall plan of activities in ceews power sector programme


regularly track important developments policy and technical in the sector through rigorous literature review and share summary with team members to bring them up to date


assist in writing highquality research reports and publish in leading peer reviewed journals


generate knowledge content  blogs policy briefs in regular intervals


assist in preparing presentations fact sheets and other research communication material


to participate in relevant conferences workshops training programmes as necessary to communicate research findings and gain insights on new research in focus areas


travel to industrialproject sites across multiple states to conduct interviews and collect data for different research projects




shortlisting criteria and key skills




foundational degree in engineering is a prerequisite a graduate degree in economics development economics public policy energy economics or related disciplines such as energy management would be desirable


at least  years of relevant work experience with a track record of project assistance and timely delivery of outputs


should have a good foundation in coalbased power generation along with an understanding of the value chain of thermal power generation electricity markets and basic economic principles


ability to analyse and visualise large data sets proficiency in using ms excel prior experience in the use of statistical tools like matlabstatarpython is desirable


strong analytical and networking skills


good written and oral communication skills


ability to summarise and communicate the insightsfindings as reports and presentations


prior publications in peerreviewed journalsbook chapters would be a bonus




personality




willingness to learn new research and project management skills


ability to adapt to new environment and deliver under tight deadlines in a professional environment


striving for rigour in research and quality in work output


ability to effectively work in a team while being able to independently drive research with minimum assistance when time demands


ability to dig deeper into details while also keeping a sense of the broader objectives and big picture


willingness to learn grow and develop at the personal and professional front at a rapid pace with a steep learning curve


ability to work in an interdisciplinary and multicultural environment




ceew operates in a dynamic environment and the candidate will be required to show flexibility in undertaking a variety of tasks ceew is an equal opportunity employer female candidates are encouraged to apply



compensation

competitive compensation  commensurate to the experience and matching the best of standards adopted by industry or other similar organisations for similar roles

Job Title: Data Backfill Audit - Data Analyst-Contra -Remote Full-Time
Job Description:
why do we need this role

in q  chegg performed a historical data backfill of adobe logs site activity from our legacy adobe

logs was transformed and migrated into the structure of our cheggowned event schema during the

project key metrics were validated to ensure that the transformed data aligned with historical metrics

over the last four months as more reports cut over to the new data source weve discovered issues in

the secondary and tertiary metrics that were never validated during the backfill reacting to these

issues is  causing data users to become less trustful of data and  sucking up bandwidth from teams

who are already committed to h and h roadmap programs

what will this role deliver

this role will perform an audit of our event data to identify data issues and work with the data engineer

contractor to resolve them the initial focus will be on validating secondary and tertiary metrics from

the historical the audit and reprocessed data will deliver a purified event lake that is accurate and

trusted

responsibilities

this role will identify issues in the historical backfill determine the root cause of issues determine the

best method to resolve the issue and write the data spec that instructs data engineering how to resolve

the issue key to this role will be having the ability to formulate complex data queries construct and

test hypotheses as to what mightve caused a data issue then partner with engineering to resolve the

gaps

requirements
 years of demonstrated success in an analytics role developing and analyzing data processing

frameworks
topdecile data wrangling skills strength in sql and python for data analysis and transformations
experience with adobe analytics clickstream logs preferred

overview


the clinton health access initiative inc chai is a global health organization committed to our mission of saving lives and reducing the burden of disease in lowand middleincome countries we work at the invitation of governments to support them and the private sector to create and sustain highquality health systems

chai was founded in  in response to the hivaids epidemic with the goal of dramatically reducing the price of lifesaving drugs and increasing access to these medicines in the countries with the highest burden of the disease over the following two decades chai has expanded its focus today along with hiv we work in conjunction with our partners to prevent and treat infectious diseases such as covid malaria tuberculosis and hepatitis our work has also expanded into cancer diabetes hypertension and other noncommunicable diseases and we work to accelerate the rollout of lifesaving vaccines reduce maternal and child mortality combat chronic malnutrition and increase access to assistive technology we are investing in horizontal approaches to strengthen health systems through programs in human resources for health digital health and health financing with each new and innovative program our strategy is grounded in maximizing sustainable impact at scale ensuring that governments lead the solutions that programs are designed to scale nationally and learnings are shared globally

at chai our people are our greatest asset and none of this work would be possible without their talent time dedication and passion for our mission and values we are a highly diverse team of enthusiastic individuals across  countries with a broad range of skillsets and life experiences chai is deeply grounded in the countries we work in with majority of our staff based in program countries

in india chai works in partnership with its india registered affiliate william j clinton foundation wjcf under the guidance of the ministry of health and family welfare mohfw at the central and states levels on an array of high priority initiatives aimed at improving health outcomes currently wjcf supports government partners across projects to expand access to quality care and treatment for hivaids hepatitis tuberculosis covid common cancers sexual and reproductive health immunization and essential medicines

learn more about our exciting work httpwwwclintonhealthaccessorg

position summary

the viral hepatitis program works on addressing barriers to access to essential diagnostic testing and treatment for hepatitis b  c the team works closely with various departmentsdivisions of the ministry of health and other organizations to increase access to and accelerate the uptake of drugsdiagnostics among the infected population over the past few years the program has been providing strategic and operational support both at the national level and at the state level in punjab haryana and madhya pradesh this support has included developing strategic and operational plans designing monitoring and evaluation tools to monitor and measure program performance and formulating screening strategies through the identification of highrisk geographies and populations


wjcf is seeking a highly motivated individual with outstanding credentials analytical ability and communication skills to support its viral hepatitis program the candidate must be able to function independently and flexibly and have a strong commitment to excellence wjcf places great value on relevant personal qualities resourcefulness responsibility tenacity independence energy and work ethic

purpose



the industrial sustainability and competitiveness isc team aims to support indias low carbon growth aspirations by advancing the uptake of energy and resource efficiency practices as well as the use of energy source with lowno carbon footprints within the manufacturing sector the isc team is working on several different initiatives which include  supply chain analysis of the natural gas infrastructure in india building resilience and competitiveness in the micro small and medium msme industry and characterizing the industrial sector value chains to analyse various aspects such as carbon footprint financial strength resource requirements and jobs supported



the isc team seeks to hire a highly committed candidate to build and expand our programme on hydrogen value chain research across a range of technical and policy areas this role demands high quality research to provide direction support and insights to the policy planners and industry captains towards decarbonisation options candidate should have an active and selfdirected interest towards emerging market applications such as fuel cell electric vehicles renewable hydrogen for industrial decarbonisation etc shehe should be able to perform resource assessments market projections technoeconomic analysis riskassessment scenario comparisons etc the role offers an excellent opportunity to build and strengthen an emerging research area while collaborating with international experts



job duties and accountabilities



research




to build data resources through active desktop research intelligent webscraping andor primary means etc for several analytical requirements


to drive the tracking of important developments  policy and technical in the sector and be able to inform other teams of the relevance of these for their own work

to be able to induct new tools and approaches in the analysis of the said sectorssubsectors


to be able to write highquality first drafts of reports and analyses for internal and external circulation


to generate knowledge content  blogs policy briefs at regular intervals


support stakeholder engagement and relevant convening including policy and technical exchanges among government officials rd facilities subject experts etc


drive daily analytical requirements of the team in responding to shortturnaround requests or studies


to present research to key constituencies advisory bodies conferences  research institutes


to develop research networks locally nationally and internationally in support of research programmes


travel within india is likely to be periodic and presence in the field  meeting with stakeholders is an important part of the role




if you believe that hydrogen has the potential to decarbonise the economy and have interesting ideas on how it can happen then we are looking for you

familiarity and a high degree of comfort with quantitative techniques certificate courses in specialisations relevant to the job role would be a bonus


prior research experience on areas related to the hydrogen value chain will be an added bonus

superior project management skills confidence to handle tasks and engage with stakeholders singlehandedly would be highly preferred

job description


the 
wadhwani institute for technology and policy witp 
is a new institution established in india to leverage emerging technologies in ways that improve public service delivery and decision making funded by the 
wadhwani foundation
 the philanthropic body established in  by dr romesh wadhwani witp is envisioned to be a globally unique institution with a dual mission working both as a think tank and a training academy witp is seeking a technology policy analyst to work in our delhibengaluru office

the candidate will be responsible for reviewing researching assessing and generating papers on the technology policy of the government of india they will help identify gaps in the governments policies and suggest measures to bridge those gaps the broad scope of work includes analyzing policy issues of various ministries related to technology and policies that have a technology component research topics will range from data security data storage and sharing adoption of new age technology aimlblockchaind printing etc by governments to the democratization of technology and data and more the objective will be to work to influence policies that will improve public service delivery through the implementation and application of key emerging technologies




the ideal candidate will be an experienced professional with demonstrable policy analysis skills in new age technology areas like aiml blockchain d printing cyber security and others the candidate must perform well under pressure have strong analytical and writing skills and be highly detailoriented preference will be given to candidates that possess a technology background andor have meaningful experience of working within the government sector think tanks or other similar organizations and situations

responsibilities

policy analysis

conduct research review and analyze current government policies evaluate the effects of proposed legislation and report on findings within the technology domain



analyze trends in legislation and governmental policy announcements on the adoption of new age technology



identify issues that need to be addressed through formulation of technology policy especially in the field of new age technologies



conduct research and prepare analyses reports and position papers which will form the basis for formulating policies in support of technological innovation and adoption of new age technology for service delivery



conduct impact analysis of policies and identify areas for midterm correction

advising

track and advice the witp team and senior management on trends and developments in the technology policy arena that may affect service delivery of the government or data managed by it



provide information documentation andor advice concerning the impact of proposed policies on technological innovation and commercialization at both the central and state levels of government functioning



work with representatives of the academic community and other think tanks on above mentioned issues



work with central and state governments to brainstorm and participate in pocs or pilot projects that might need to be executed by witp as part of their outreach and good governance effort

qualifications skills  experience


skills

strong research and analytical skills and an interest in the intersection of technology and policy



interpersonal skills necessary to work effectively as part of a larger team and with a variety of colleagues external partners and policy leaders



efficient time management and ability to multitask and prioritize competing priorities



sound judgment good analytical and technical capabilities good oral communication and writing skills and strong conceptual and strategic thinking skills



ability to work independently with minimal oversight handle multiple tasks simultaneously establish priorities meet deadlines and solve problems



commitment to witps nonpartisan mission and goals to serve the needs of policy leaders in the government through factbased recommendations informed by scientific evidence and technical expertise

qualification

 undergraduate degree in a related field is required a post graduate degree in public policy international relations or related fields is preferred

 familiarity and interest in technology and technology policy is an essential requirement

experience

  years of relevant work experience in technology policy analysis or related roles

 proficiency in the programs policies regulations and laws related to new age technologies especially in the domains of data ai and related subdomains

Job Title: Research Analyst/Programme Associate – Scaling up Regenerative Agriculture in India
Job Description:
council on energy environment and water ceew new delhi

research analystprogramme associate  scaling up regenerative agriculture in india


terms of reference



at ceew we are deliberate about what we stand for and what we dont stand for as an employer so if the below description strikes a chord we would love to hear from you



at ceew we build careers in public policy

we offer strong visionary leadership  with emphasis on research and impact at scale

we actively promote leadership by initiative

we celebrate talent and ambition

you will be surrounded by smart ambitious people who will challenge you and help you grow

you will learn faster than your peers in other organisations

curiosity and irreverence as well as responsibility come together at ceew

you will get abovemarket remuneration

we provide a safe space for all

at ceew your life is your example for others

designation offered

research analystprogramme associate


reporting to

programme associate  programme lead


location

new delhi india


purpose



indias food system is faced with a complex challenge of ensuring nutritional security for all improving livelihoods of those associated with food production while adapting to a changing climate and reducing the ecological impacts of conventional agriculture on our environment step towards systemic transformation requires a framework for stakeholders to design plan and evaluate scalable projects in sustainable and regenerative agriculture there is a need to converge actions of policy makers field workers funders and innovators to achieve sustainability at scale



the sustainable food systems sfs programme at ceew consists of a young and vibrant team of food policy professionals who are passionate about defining and solving the food crisis in a degree approach systems thinking is at the core of how we look at issues in the food system



we want to hire a suitable candidate for the research analyst  programme associate position an appropriate offer will be made based on the candidates passion experience and relevance to the programme we are happy to discuss both consulting and fulltime positions



for the first year the candidate will predominantly manage research documentation and analysis on scaling up sustainable and regenerative agriculture in india for a specific project this task includes  case study analysis understanding theory of change of successfully scaled up initiatives in india using qualitative methods social network analysis applying systems thinking tools and developing usable framework for ngos csos private companies public institutions and funders to design and evaluate projects aimed at scaling up and sustaining impact the work will be complimented by policy analysis stakeholder communication field visits and engaging with the leaders in the sector prior experience in theory generation andor impact frameworkstool development is a plus



they will also assist other team members in undertaking robust quantitative analysis wherever required in addition to the duties and responsibilities outlined below the research analyst programme associate should be prepared as and when necessary to take on additional responsibilities and respond to events and developments that cannot be anticipated easily



job duties and accountabilities



research




independently manage allocated workstreams on qualitative applied research such workstreams include but are not limited to i identification of optimal research approachframework for case study analysis ii conducting stakeholder consultations iii if required systematic literature review v collation of analysis using appropriate qualitative methods iv communicating analyses to sector leaders in a coherent narrative iv application of analyses to specified geographical areas in india and evaluating findings


regularly track policy measures at state and national levels and their implementation status in specified geographical areas of india identify policy convergence for scaling up sustainable and regenerative agriculture an understanding of policy frameworks and governance systems in india is a plus


travel to field sites whenever necessary to conduct fieldwork including focus group discussions interviews meetings training or gather primary information


the candidate will also be expected to support the team with quantitative research this includes but is not limited to i development and execution of primary surveys this includes designing the questionnaires survey monitoring coordinating with field staffs and analysis of the survey data ii if required conducting the relevant analyses using appropriate qualitative andor quantitative tools eg ms excel stata etc and iii presenting the analyses in a coherent narrative in different formats

Job Title: Risk Analyst – Banking and Financial Services sector
Job Description:
about cpi



climate policy initiative cpi works to improve the most important energy and land use policies around the world with a particular focus on finance cpi supports decision makers through indepth analysis on what works and what does not cpi works in places that provide the most potential for policy impact including brazil europe india indonesia and the united states our work helps nations grow while addressing increasingly scarce resources and climate risk cpi focuses on the nexus of policy and finance with deep expertise across energy transition and improving access to clean energy green cities and sustainable infrastructure forests and land use adaptation  resilience naturebased solutions sustainable agriculture and other related climate sectors





cpi is a small but dynamic organization with a global reach and an entrepreneurial culture we work hard to maintain an ideadriven collaborative environment across all our teams cpis team has significant experience in economics finance government industry law and policy you may refer to wwwclimatepolicyinitiativeorg for more information on the type of work youll be doing if you join our team





cpis india office focuses on three workstreams




policy and regulatory interventions to accelerate climate finance green finance and sustainable finance in india by informing regulation and policy and builds on the work carried out by cpi under the task force for sustainable finance led by department of economic affairs ministry of finance


financing energy transition including electricity transition industrial decarbonization and transport decarbonization which focuses on recommending financing interventions to accelerate investments for a lowcarbon economy and and


enabling capital through project preparatory facilities ppf technical assistance ta programs and risk mitigation mechanisms focusing on enabling private capital through project preparatory support investment advisory and pipeline generation support and designing blended finance and risk mitigation structures




the nature of the work varies across consulting projects research projects and program management





position summary



cpis india office is looking to hire an analyst to support the deliverables of the climate green and sustainable finance workstream





under the supervision and guidance of senior staff analysts undertake robust and careful analysis drawing on methodologies from micro and macroeconomics public policy regulatory economics finance behavioral science risk management statistics law engineering and other academic and commercial disciplines analysts work in close cooperation with a range of international partners from the policy finance and corporate spheres as well as with cpi teams across the globe





cpi offers a challenging environment that requires independent thinking collaboration and pragmatic problem solving




primary duties  responsibilities



includes the following and others as assigned




further work in area of climate risk and overall risk management stream with a focus on climate change from a development lens


perform rigorous quantitative and qualitative evaluation of national and international climate finance mechanisms risk management mechanisms and interactions between public and private actors and resources


support the writing and editing of highquality cpi products including full reports executive summaries blogs and presentations produce highquality materials that are fit for purpose time and within budget


support opportunities identified to develop and consolidate work streams and develop funding proposals under guidance of senior management


engage clients advise policymakers and investors on the implications of research findings under the supervision of senior management


communicate and collaborate with cpi staff working on global projects in climate finance tracking green finance in cities research and analytical work in the areas of sustainablegreenclimate finance


qualifications  experience




experience in financial services management consulting international nonprofit or development financial institution is 
mandatory

background in financial sector  bankingcapital marketsinsurance is mandatory


understanding of banking or capital markets or insurance regulations is mandatory


experience in credit riskmarket riskoperational risk is mandatory


understanding of climate finance and the financial sector actors is useful


bachelors degree in economics finance engineering or any other relevant field masters degree in finance risk economics would be preferred


competencies  personal attributes




quantitative analysis skills


advanced user of ms office suite in particular excel


independent analytical mind with a track record of applying sound financial political and strategic judgment to complex issues


flexibility professionalism enthusiasm for working as part of a team and an ability to interact with a diverse array of people


strong attention to detail organization time management and prioritization skills


superior english written and verbal communications skills


an ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines if required


willingness to travel domestically

Job Title: Senior Program Research Analyst – Modelling (Energy Program), WRI India
Job Description:
senior program research analyst  modelling energy program wri india




who we are and what we do



wri india an independent charity legally registered as the india resources trust provides objective information and practical proposals to foster environmentally sound and socially equitable development wri indias mission is to move human society to live in ways that protect earths environment and its capacity to provide for the needs and aspirations of current and future generations through research analysis and recommendations wri india puts ideas into action to build transformative solutions to protect the earth promote livelihoods and enhance human wellbeing

we are inspired by and associated with world resources institute wri a global research organization currently over  researchers are working with wri india in our offices at delhi mumbai and bengaluru




program overview for energy



the objective of the wri india energy program is to inform and guide indias transition to cleaner energy the program focuses on three interrelated aspects of this energy transition enhancing energy access scaling renewables among specific consumer categories and achieving higher levels of energy and buildings efficiency our energy access work is specifically aimed at ensuring access to affordable and clean energy so as to improve socioeconomic development in rural and remote regions of india through strong research groundlevel implementation experience partnerships with key stakeholders and communicating our work we seek to achieve impact at scale




about your role



wri has deep experience in the energy sector and on climate change across several topic areas and is widely recognized as a leader on energy and climate issues in india we have a multipronged energy strategy that looks strategically at directing our tools research expertise and partnerships to support indias clean energy transition across varied economic activities like extraction production distribution consumption and waste management in ensuring universal access to reliable affordable and sustainable electricity and minimizing energy losses and thereby contributing to energy planning and policy analysis




the energy program at wri india is seeking a senior research associate  modelling energy program to work with and support research focused on state energy transition





how your day will unfold



following responsibilities





develop build maintain update energy sector models and databases to track the energy scenario databases including utility electricity supply demand sources costs tariffs revenues etc this will be starting at state level and would expand to working across different regions in india

actively engage in modelling efforts with appropriate analysis of the energy sector using various modelling platforms specifically opensource tools
engage with key state energy agencies private sector civil society academia and participate in energy modelling fora by representing wriis research analysis and point of view at these fora
contribute to creationcocreation of various scenarios in the model and model documentation of existing and future models


support in conducting policy research data collation data analysis and data interpretation

indepth understanding of major policy reform processes states energy and development sector policies and identify opportunities to provide inputs to the modelling exercises
track tariff petitions and regulatory commission orders and other government portals  especially those related to clean energy to gather appropriate data and interpret for supporting in the clean energy transition work
participate in research projects to produce policy  issue briefs and other publications and reports online and print
lead specific modules in the project as identified by the energy lead
participate in andor lead efforts to communicate the results of research undertaken
perform other tasks as assigned by the energy lead including support on research and analysis



qualification and requirements we seek




appropriate masters degree in energy economics statistics data science engineering or development related discipline with exposure to the subject area of energyenvironmental economics
at least   years of relevant experience in energy sector

demonstrable experience in energypower sector modeling and computational skills
strong research computational and analytical skills supported by professional experience in the domain of energy modelling along with contribution to publications and research reports
prior experience working with energyclimate models and power sector planning tools is mandatory
proficiency in software programs and modelling tools like leap plexos pypsa python dispatch modelling tools r stata homer load flow analysis and other open source softwares is favourable
willingness to learn new tools and modelling techniques to contribute to the ongoingnew research projects is essential
knowledge of the indian energy sector power sector policy landscape sectoral developments industry trends and governmental functioning is necessary

knowledge about econometric modelling and statistical techniques to analyse large quantitative datasets is a plus
be proactive in researching and pitching ideas maintaining connections with policy makers government agencies and media contacts
good communications skill supported by a portfolio of articulations eg writings and speaking engagements related to energy models
strong ability to communicate clearly and effectively in conversation and writing including professional quality writing for policy and communications products in english
strong ability to brainstorm and think creatively about all elements of their work
willingness to travel locally and ability to work cooperatively with others to demonstrate flexibility in fulfilling assignments is essential

an associate machine learning ml scientist at wadhwani ai will build scientifically rigorous and robustly evaluated ai solutions that will be deployed in order to bring ai to the benefit of underserved billions across the developing world



about us



wadhwani ai is a nonprofit applied ai institute that brings artificial intelligence technology to social challenges in low and middleincome countries through our solutions ai becomes an enabling technology that bridges the gap between problems and solutions augments human capabilities and provides advanced decision support we collaborate with social sector organizations the government domain experts and academic institutions to identify realworld challenges create and deploy innovative ai solutions to reach intended users and beneficiaries  with the objective of creating sustainable scalable impact



currently we are building aibased solutions in the agriculture and health domains such as pest management maternal newborn and child health tuberculosis and covid



our projects are supported by leading philanthropies such as bill  melinda gates foundation bmgf usaid and googleorg



our accolades are as follows




wadhwani ai was the only google ai impact challenge winner from india in  and the first organization in the asia pacific to welcome a cohort of google fellows


our pest management solution cottonace earned an honourable mention at the fast company world changing awards 


in april  cottonace was announced as one of the five winners of the global change award gca in  the global change award is an endeavour by the hm foundation to transform fashion and turn the entire industry planet positive




roles and responsibilities



as an associate ml scientist you will be responsible for building robust machine learning solutions to problems of societal importance usually under the guidance of senior ml scientists you will participate in translating a problem in the social sector to a welldefined ai problem in the development and execution of algorithms and solutions to the problem in the successful and scaled deployment of the ai solution and in defining appropriate metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of the deployed solution



in order to apply machine learning for social good you will need to understand user challenges and their context curate and transform data train and validate models run simulations and broadly derive insights from data in doing so you will work in crossfunctional teams spanning ml modeling engineering solution and domain experts you will also interface with social sector organizations as appropriate



requirements



associate ml scientists will have a strong academic background in a quantitative field see below at the bachelors or masters level with project experience in applied machine learning they will possess demonstrable skills in coding data mining and analysis and building and implementing ml or statistical models where needed they will have to learn and adapt to the requirements imposed by reallife scaled deployments



candidates should have excellent communication skills and a willingness to adapt to the challenges of doing applied work for social good



desired qualifications




btechbebsmtechmemsmsc or equivalent in computer science electrical engineering statistics applied mathematics physics economics or a relevant quantitative field work experience beyond the terminal degree will determine the appropriate seniority level


solid software engineering skills across one or multiple languages including python c java


interest in applying software engineering practices to ml projects


track record of project work in applied machine learning experience in applying ai models to concrete realworld problems is a plus


strong verbal and written communication skills in english

 junior research analyst  esg



the team

sp global is one of the leading providers of the esg data for investors corporates and other stakeholders esg creates value for our clients value to investors in mitigating risk of longterm investments and value to corporates through long term financial performance it focuses on collecting broad range of esg data through a variety of company and governmental sources to provide users with an indepth multifaceted view into the nature and strength of a companys resistance to changes in esg components liaise with various critical stakeholders in understanding and building the content set this data is used by investors asset managers and in sp globals various divisions and products the team is responsible for managing sp globals proprietary database comprising one of the worlds most complete datasets on corporate sustainability



the impact
 as a part of sps sustainable esg team you will develop and maintain accurate complete and timely data sets while taking into account the business divisions global interests and needs internally  externally


as a junior research analyst you will support the integrity and comprehensiveness of the data set by utilizing internal  external public research sources such as government  regulatory documents stock exchanges csr reports industry journals analyst reports as well as information databases and our internal research tools to collect summarize and synthesize meaningful information



whats in it for you

we are searching for people that are passionate about sustainability and would like to join a projectfocused international team of likeminded people driven to deliver excellence in managing the worlds most known family of sustainability indices and one of the leading corporate sustainability benchmarking methodologies

you will interact with a global team

you will be part of a newly established growing team

you will gain valuable insights on upcoming esg trends

you will have lots of runway for advancement and personal development with best in class esg methodology



responsibilities

process data financialesg qualitative and quantitative data and apply it in an accurate manner to the database using csa guidance

collection standardization and validation of data from various documents

good understanding of esg concepts esg research methodologies and trends

deliver on predefined individual and team targets including delivering outcomes with quality and efficiency

engage with esg analysts to understand the challenges and suggest solutions

keeps himherself updated in knowledge of content sets build industry knowledge by understanding industry trends and reporting standards

provides input and ideas for new collection methods and product improvements related to the covered content sets

troubleshoots problems or issues and provide support to the team



what were looking for

possess necessary skills to interpret documents like articles bylaws and prospectus of companies annual reports sustainability reports codes of conduct

should be willing to work in rotational shifts ability to multitask and work in a team environment while following flexible schedule to meet deadlines

strong attention to detail and persistent approach to work

strong research and analytical skills

good written and oral presentation skills

convenient taking initiative and demonstrating resourcefulness

agile mindset as it involves a lot of collaboration and coordination

the team
 sp global is one of the leading providers of the esg data for investors corporates and other stakeholders esg creates value for our clients value to investors in mitigating risk of longterm investments and value to corporates through long term financial performance it focuses on collecting broad range of esg data through a variety of company and governmental sources to provide users with an indepth multifaceted view into the nature and strength of a companys resistance to changes in esg components liaise with various critical stakeholders in understanding and building the content set this data is used by investors asset managers and in sp global s various divisions and products the team is responsible for managing sp globals proprietary database comprising one of the worlds most complete datasets on corporate sustainability



the impact 
 as a part of sps esg team you will develop and maintain accurate complete and timely data sets while considering the business divisions global interests and needs internally  externally


as a quality research specialist you will support the integrity and comprehensiveness of the data set by utilizing internal  external public research sources such as government  regulatory documents stock exchanges csr reports industry journals analyst reports as well as information databases and our internal research tools to collect summarize and synthesize meaningful information

we are searching for people that are passionate about sustainability and would like to join a project focused international team of likeminded people driven to deliver excellence in managing the worlds most known family of sustainability indices and one of the leading corporate sustainability benchmarking methodologies

nielseniq is a leading global provider of data analytics and insights that helps businesses make informed decisions about their markets and consumers the company specializes in providing solutions for consumer packaged goods cpg manufacturers and retailers offering a range of services that include market research data analytics and consulting with its innovative technology and extensive experience in the industry nielseniq enables clients to better understand their consumers and gain a competitive edge in the marketplace the company is committed to delivering actionable insights that drive growth and profitability for its clients



about this job

data science drives everything we do here at nielseniq our statistical research is at the forefront of an industry moving at the speed of light gddc is responsible for all design related activities in data science gddc is basically responsible for setting up the base of any product like retail index ecomm cash  carry scan track service newexisting they work closely with all the stakeholders to understand the client requirements amp provide recommendationssuggestions so as to best build up the product which balances expectations from both the client and methodological requirements the gddc team is responsible for processes starting from scope definition to panel sample design which would include processes like sample design extrapolation and simulation etc

bachelors or masters degree in maths stats economics actuarial science engineering

computer scienceit with good knowledge of statistics analytics data science


proficient in python or r and other open source tools


relevant work experience of  to  years


intellectual curiosity and persistence to find answers to questions


eager to continuously learn and adapt to changing technologies and tools


solid understanding of statistics


good aptitude for data analysis


familiar with contemporary database systems




responsibilities




design execute and deliver analytical studies extracting and utilizing data from multiple sources to identify new insights for clients and internal teams


prepare communications of study results for broad distribution to clients and internal teams through written and video media


develop and maintain performance dashboards and webbased reporting tools


engage with senior level colleagues to ensure the development and successful implementation of plans to address performance opportunities


proactively identify potential risks to the data quality of analyses assist in required

investigations to ensure prompt and accurate resolution of potential issues


communicate effectively with clients and senior level colleagues to ensure the quality of input data used in analyses the understanding of results and the successful completion of followup actions


maintain flexibility in working in a dynamic work environment where delivery schedules and priorities fluctuate according to client needs and external department demands


work collaboratively with colleagues in the same location and in offices located globally


recommend improvements in processes within the area of responsibility




who you will mostly work with

engage with internal stakeholders in data science operations and stat ops in the planning and on the rollout of country enhancements
